payments.title: Payments
payments.paymentRecordsDesc: Manage cash and online payment records
payments.addCashPaymentDesc: Record a cash payment received from a resident. A receipt will be generated after saving.
payments.invalidResidentError: Invalid resident selection. Please select a resident with an apartment number.
payments.noPaymentsRecordedDesc: Click "Add Payment" to record your first payment.

expenses.title: Expenses
expenses.deleteExpenseConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete this expense? This action is irreversible.

residents.title: Residents
residents.addingSelfDesc: You are about to add yourself as a resident to your managed residence. Your profile information will remain unchanged, and only your apartment number and phone number (if provided) will be updated. No verification email will be sent since you are adding yourself.
residents.emailExistsError: This email is already registered to another user. Please use a different email address.
residents.emailAlreadyExists: This email already exists in the database.
residents.onlyApartmentEditable: This user already exists in the database. Only the apartment number can be edited.
residents.syndicRoleCannotChange: Role: Syndic (cannot be changed) - This user already has a syndic role. Cannot be changed but considered as a resident.
residents.residentRoleCannotChange: Role: Resident (cannot be changed) - This resident already has the resident role. Cannot be changed.
residents.apartmentRequired: Apartment number is required for residents. Guards can have number 0.
residents.apartmentTaken: This apartment is already occupied by {name}
residents.apartmentCannotBeZero: Apartment number cannot be 0 for residents
residents.deleteResidentConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete this resident?
residents.cannotRemoveSelf: You cannot remove yourself from the residents list.

documentUpload.title: Upload Meeting Minutes
documentUpload.description: Please upload your "meeting minutes" document to complete your verification
documentUpload.procesVerbalDesc: Document required to verify your residence
documentUpload.pendingDesc: Your document was submitted on {date} and is pending review by an administrator.
documentUpload.approvedDesc: Your document was approved on {date}. You can now access the application.
documentUpload.rejectedDesc: Your document was rejected. Please upload a new document.
documentUpload.deleteAccountTitle: Delete my account and sign out
documentUpload.deleteAccountConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete your account? This action is irreversible and:
documentUpload.deleteAccountList1: Will permanently delete your user account
documentUpload.deleteAccountList2: Will delete all documents you submitted
documentUpload.deleteAccountList3: Will delete your profile and all associated data
documentUpload.deleteAccountList4: Will cancel your subscriptions and payments
documentUpload.deleteAccountList5: You will be automatically signed out
documentUpload.deleteAccountConfirmButton: Yes, delete and sign me out
documentUpload.instruction1: Meeting minutes is required for verification
documentUpload.instruction2: ID card is required and recommended to confirm syndic information
documentUpload.instruction3: Documents must be PDF, JPG or PNG files
documentUpload.instruction5: Make sure documents are readable and complete
documentUpload.instruction6: Your documents will be reviewed by an administrator

dashboard.outstandingFeesMessage: You have {amount} in outstanding fees. Sending reminders could improve collection by 20%.
dashboard.greatJob: Great job! Your collection rate is optimal. Consider announcing the good financial health to residents.

profile.title: Profile and Settings
profile.description: Manage your account information and subscription
profile.failedToLoadData: Failed to load profile data. Please try again later.
profile.name: Name
profile.profileImageDesc: Your profile picture is visible to other users
profile.pricingPlansNotAvailable: Pricing plans are not available at the moment.
profile.pleaseWaitFetchingPlans: Please wait while we fetch your plans.
profile.refreshOrContactSupport: Please refresh the page or contact support if this issue persists.
profile.dangerZoneDesc: Permanently delete your account and all associated data
profile.accountWillBePermanentlyDeleted: Your account will be permanently deleted. This action cannot be undone.
profile.warningCannotBeUndone: This action cannot be undone. Your account and all associated data will be permanently deleted.
profile.warningCannotBeUndoneFull: This action cannot be undone. Your account and all associated data will be permanently deleted. All data including residence information, fees, payments, incidents, announcements, and all related records will be removed and cannot be recovered.
profile.failedToCancelDeletionRequestTryAgain: Failed to cancel deletion request. Please try again.
profile.cannotSelectSyndicAsSuccessor: Cannot select a syndic as a successor. Please select a different resident.
profile.cannotSelectSyndicAsSuccessorFull: Cannot select a syndic as a successor. Syndics cannot be added as residents. Please select a different resident.
profile.deletionRequestAlreadyPending: A deletion request is already pending. Please wait for administrator approval.
profile.failedToDeleteAccountTryAgain: Failed to delete account. Please try again.
profile.deletionRequestSubmittedSuccess: Deletion request submitted successfully. An administrator will review your request.
profile.deletionRequestSubmittedOn: Your deletion request was submitted on {date}.
profile.adminWillReviewAndSelectSuccessor: An administrator will review your request and select a successor.
profile.deletionRequestApprovedOn: Your deletion request was approved on {date}.
profile.accountWillBeDeletedSoon: Your account will be deleted soon.
profile.deletionRequestCompletedOn: Your deletion request was completed on {date}.
profile.deletionRequestRejectedOn: Your deletion request was rejected on {date}.
profile.selectSuccessorDesc: Since your residence has other residents, you must select a successor to take over the Syndic role before deleting your account.
profile.noEligibleResidentsFound: No eligible residents found. Please contact an administrator.
profile.searchSuccessorPlaceholder: Search by name, email, or phone...
profile.pleaseSelectSuccessorBeforeSubmit: Please select a successor before submitting the deletion request
profile.readConditionsCarefully: Please read the following conditions carefully before proceeding.
profile.aboutToPermanentlyDelete: You are about to permanently delete your account.
profile.allPaymentsSubscriptionsCancelled: All your active payments and subscriptions will be canceled immediately.
profile.accountAndDataPermanentlyDeleted: Your account and all associated data will be permanently deleted.
profile.allDataIncludingResidence: All data including residence information, fees, payments, incidents, announcements, and all related records will be removed and cannot be recovered.
profile.readAndAcceptConditions: I have read and accept these conditions

error.title: Something went wrong!
error.description: We encountered an unexpected error. Please try again.

notFound.title: Page Not Found
notFound.description: The page you're looking for doesn't exist or has been moved.

contributions.title: Contribution Management
contributions.setupDescription: Choose how you want to manage monthly contributions for your residence
contributions.historicalImportDesc: Perfect if you have existing records
contributions.historicalImportInfo: If you have existing contribution records from Excel, PDF, or manual records, import them to get started quickly with full historical data.
contributions.historicalFeature4: Excel or CSV file formats supported
contributions.startFreshInfo: Set up monthly contributions from scratch using our automated system. Perfect for new residences or fresh starts.
contributions.searchPlaceholder: Search by apartment or resident name...
contributions.uploadDescription: Upload an Excel or CSV file with your contribution records
contributions.templateDescription: Use our template to format your data correctly
contributions.configureParamsDesc: Set the year and contribution amount for this import
contributions.monthlyAmountDesc: Standard contribution amount for all residents
contributions.previewDescription: Review data before importing. Matched rows will be imported.
contributions.importSuccessDesc: Your historical contribution data has been successfully imported.
contributions.configureDescription: Set up automatic monthly fee generation for your residence
contributions.settingsApplyAll: These settings will apply to all residents in your residence
contributions.amountDesc: This amount will be charged to each resident every month
contributions.emailRemindersDesc: Send automatic payment reminders to residents
contributions.reminderDayDesc: Day of the month to send reminder (1-28)
contributions.afterSetup: After completing this setup, the system will:
contributions.afterSetup1: Automatically generate monthly fees for all residents
contributions.afterSetup2: Send email reminders to residents about upcoming contributions
contributions.afterSetup3: Track payments and update status in real-time
contributions.afterSetup4: Generate monthly reports on contributions and collection
contributions.addContributionDesc: Manually add a contribution record for an apartment
contributions.fillRequired: Please fill in all required fields.
contributions.paymentDetailsRequired: Payment method and date are required for paid contributions.
contributions.noDataFound: No data found. Try adjusting your search or filters.
contributions.deleteContributionConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete this contribution? This action cannot be undone if the contribution has no related payments.
contributions.noActivePlanFound: No active contribution plan found. Please create and activate a plan first.
contributions.contributionsAlreadyExist: Contributions already exist for this period and no other plans are available.
contributions.selectPlanDescription: Contributions already exist for the active plan. Select another plan to apply for this period.
contributions.noAvailablePlans: No available plans found for this period.
contributions.invalidFileType: Please upload an Excel or CSV file
contributions.failedToParseFile: Failed to parse file. Please check the format.
contributions.validAmountRequired: Please enter a valid contribution amount
contributions.unmatchedApartmentsDesc: Some apartments could not be matched to residents. These will be skipped during import.
contributions.residenceIdNotFound: Residence ID not found. Please refresh the page.

plans.title: Contribution Plans
plans.managePlans: Manage recurring contribution rules for your residence
plans.createFirstPlan: Create your first plan to start managing contributions.
plans.deletePlanConfirm:
Are you sure you want to delete this plan? This action cannot be undone.

Note: Plans with related contributions cannot be deleted.
plans.createPlanDescription: Set up a recurring contribution plan for your residence
plans.startDateTip: Tip: Set this to the 1st of the month to include the full month.
plans.generationSettingsDesc: Automatic contribution generation and scheduling will be available in a future update.
plans.lateFeeSettingsDesc: Automatic late fee calculation and application will be available in a future update.
plans.reminderSettingsDesc: Automated email reminders will be available in a future update.
plans.couldNotLoadResidence: Could not load your residence. Please contact support.
plans.usingResidence: Using residence: {name}. Please link your profile to a residence.

fees.manageDescription: Manage all fees for your residence
fees.noFeesFound: No fees found matching your criteria.
fees.couldNotLoadResidence: Could not load your residence. Please contact support.
fees.deleteFeeConfirm:
Are you sure you want to delete this fee? This action cannot be undone.

Note: Fees with related payments cannot be deleted.
fees.noFeesYet: No fees yet. Click "Add Fee" to create one.

payments.deletePaymentConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete this payment? This action cannot be undone.
